headline: Analyst Predicts Bitcoin Bull Market Will Last Another 14 Months, Unveils Short and Long-Term BTC Price Targets
summary: A closely followed crypto strategist believes that the Bitcoin ( BTC ) bull market will endure another year or so based on historical precedent. Pseudonymous analyst TechDev tells his 537,900 followers on the social media platform X that he thinks Bitcoin follows the business cycle, or the ebb and flow of macroeconomic activity, rather than the four-year halving cycle. According to the analyst, Bitcoin tends to rally hard when the business cycle begins a new uptrend, while the copper-to-gold ratio ‚Äì a risk-appetite indicator ‚Äìbottoms out. Taken together, TechDev says the signal marks an ‚Äúinflection point‚Äù that has historically aligned with the timing of Bitcoin bull market tops. ‚ÄúThere is a Bitcoin cycle ‚Äì just not what many think. It mirrors the business cycle. Bitcoin tops when it tops. Bitcoin goes parabolic when it inflects. Bitcoin‚Äôs ‚Äòramp‚Äô length = time until inflection Bitcoin has always topped 14 months after inflection.‚Äù Source: TechDev/X As for his Bitcoin price targets, TechDev sees BTC hitting $170,000 in the short to mid term and about $380,000 in the long term. His predictions are based on BTC‚Äôs two-day and two-week charts, which show that Bitcoin broke out from massive cup-and-handle patterns on both time frames. The cup-and-handle pattern suggests that a bullish asset will continue its uptrend after a period of consolidation. ‚ÄúWe literally just did this.‚Äù Source: TechDev/X At time of writing, Bitcoin is worth $118,110. headline: White House to Unveil National Crypto Stockpile This Wednesday: XRP Rumored to be on the List
summary: A recent post by crypto influencer Xaif has sparked intense speculation across the digital asset space. According to Xaif, the White House is set to unveil a national crypto stockpile report this Wednesday, and XRP is rumored to be featured alongside Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH). If confirmed, this could mark a defining moment in XRP‚Äôs evolution, from a widely traded asset to a strategic U.S. digital reserve. Strategic Reserve Origins In March 2025, President Donald Trump signed an executive order establishing two groundbreaking institutions: the Strategic Bitcoin Reserve and the U.S. Digital Asset Stockpile. The move came just months after his return to the White House and is widely seen as a pivot in U.S. digital asset policy. Under this framework, BTC would be recognized as a national reserve asset, while the Digital Asset Stockpile would hold other cryptocurrencies seized through legal proceedings. BIG: White House to unveil national crypto stockpile report this Wednesday! $XRP rumored to be on the list alongside BTC & ETH. Is XRP becoming a strategic U.S. digital asset? pic.twitter.com/sOywwGNF5S ‚Äî ùïèaif | (@Xaif_Crypto) July 27, 2025 The president established a Working Group on Digital Asset Markets to lead this effort, tasking it with producing a detailed policy report within 180 days. That deadline expires this Wednesday, July 30, and the upcoming release is expected to clarify the structure, purpose, and contents of the nation‚Äôs crypto holdings. XRP‚Äôs Potential Role in the National Stockpile In March, President Trump hinted on Truth Social that XRP, Cardano (ADA), and Solana (SOL) might be included in the government‚Äôs crypto stockpile. BTC and ETH were later added to the rumored list. These early disclosures sent shockwaves through the market, causing price rallies and fueling debates about which tokens the government might prioritize for long-term strategic use. If XRP is officially named in the report, it would represent a major milestone for the asset, especially given its long-standing regulatory battles with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission. Inclusion in a government-endorsed reserve would not only validate XRP‚Äôs legitimacy but also signal a shift in Washington‚Äôs stance toward the token. No Taxpayer Purchases, Only Seized Crypto Importantly, the White House has made it clear that this stockpile will consist entirely of seized digital assets, not tokens acquired through public spending. These assets originate from law enforcement actions and forfeitures, meaning taxpayers won‚Äôt foot the bill. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 This model offers a practical approach to accumulating and storing crypto, avoiding the political controversy associated with direct government purchases. XRP as a Strategic Digital Asset? While XRP‚Äôs inclusion is not yet confirmed, multiple sources suggest its presence is highly likely. Being grouped with Bitcoin and Ethereum positions XRP as a potential cornerstone of U.S. digital infrastructure. Analysts argue that such recognition could boost investor confidence and reinforce XRP‚Äôs use case in cross-border payments and financial networks. However, critics urge caution. Some in the crypto space view government stockpiling as contradictory to the decentralized nature of digital assets. Others question whether the U.S. should treat cryptocurrencies as strategic reserves at all, given their volatility. Final Thoughts Xaif‚Äôs report has ignited anticipation ahead of Wednesday‚Äôs official release. If XRP is indeed named in the national crypto stockpile, it will mark a turning point, not just for XRP but for the broader role of digital assets in American economic policy. With the world watching, all eyes now turn to Washington as the U.S. redefines its relationship with crypto on a national scale. Times Tabloid is not responsible for any financial losses. headline: Bitcoin Price Surge Unleashed: BTC Breaches $119,000 Mark!
summary: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin Price Surge Unleashed: BTC Breaches $119,000 Mark! The cryptocurrency world is buzzing with excitement as Bitcoin, the undisputed king of digital assets, once again captures headlines with a monumental price movement. According to Bitcoin World market monitoring, BTC has not just crossed, but confidently risen above the significant $119,000 mark. Specifically, on the Binance USDT market, BTC is currently trading at an impressive $119,001. This recent Bitcoin price surge is more than just a number; it‚Äôs a testament to the evolving dynamics of the digital economy and sparks crucial conversations about its future trajectory. Understanding the Recent Bitcoin Price Surge For many, witnessing Bitcoin breach such a high psychological and technical barrier is a thrilling development. This isn‚Äôt just a minor fluctuation; it signifies strong buying pressure and renewed confidence among investors. While Bitcoin has seen its fair share of dramatic rallies and corrections, breaking into new price territories always garners significant attention. What does it mean when the world‚Äôs leading cryptocurrency achieves such a milestone? Market Confidence: A sustained move above key resistance levels often indicates growing investor confidence and a bullish sentiment prevailing in the market. Increased Liquidity: Higher prices typically attract more participants, leading to increased trading volume and liquidity, making it easier for large transactions to occur without significant price impact. Psychological Impact: Reaching new highs or breaking significant thresholds like $119,000 can create a ‚Äúfear of missing out‚Äù (FOMO) among potential investors, further driving demand. This particular Bitcoin price surge highlights the asset‚Äôs resilience and its continued journey towards mainstream financial integration. It serves as a powerful reminder of Bitcoin‚Äôs unique position in the global financial landscape. What‚Äôs Fueling This Bitcoin Price Surge? Behind every significant market movement, there are underlying factors at play. The current Bitcoin price surge is likely a confluence of several powerful drivers, both fundamental and technical. Understanding these catalysts is key to comprehending the broader market narrative. Let‚Äôs explore some of the primary forces contributing to this impressive rally: Driver Explanation Institutional Adoption Increasing interest from large financial institutions, corporations, and even sovereign wealth funds adds significant capital and legitimacy to the crypto space. The approval of Bitcoin ETFs in various regions has opened doors for traditional investors to gain exposure. Macroeconomic Factors Concerns over inflation, geopolitical instability, and devaluing fiat currencies often push investors towards alternative assets like Bitcoin, which is sometimes seen as ‚Äúdigital gold‚Äù or a hedge against traditional market uncertainties. Bitcoin Halving Event The quadrennial Bitcoin halving, which reduces the supply of new Bitcoins entering circulation, historically precedes significant bull runs. The reduced supply, coupled with steady or increasing demand, naturally creates upward price pressure. Technological Advancements & Network Growth Ongoing developments in Bitcoin‚Äôs underlying technology, such as the Lightning Network for faster transactions or improved scalability solutions, enhance its utility and appeal. Growing network adoption also reinforces its value proposition. Retail Investor Interest While institutions play a large role, renewed interest from individual investors, often spurred by positive news and social media trends, can also provide significant momentum. Accessibility through user-friendly platforms continues to grow. Each of these elements contributes to a compelling narrative that supports the ongoing ascent of Bitcoin‚Äôs value. The interplay of these factors creates a robust environment for continued growth, setting the stage for future movements of the Bitcoin price surge . Navigating the Volatility: Opportunities and Challenges of a Bitcoin Price Surge While a significant Bitcoin price surge is undoubtedly exciting, it‚Äôs crucial for investors to approach the market with a balanced perspective. The crypto market is known for its volatility, and understanding both the potential opportunities and inherent challenges is vital for making informed decisions. What are the opportunities this surge presents? Potential for Capital Appreciation: The most obvious benefit is the opportunity for significant returns on investment, especially for those who invested at lower price points. Portfolio Diversification: Bitcoin can act as a non-correlated asset to traditional financial markets, potentially reducing overall portfolio risk. Innovation and Growth: A rising Bitcoin price often brings more capital and talent into the broader blockchain ecosystem, fostering further innovation and development in decentralized technologies. Increased Mainstream Acceptance: Higher prices and positive news cycles can lead to greater public awareness and acceptance, paving the way for wider adoption in commerce and finance. What challenges should investors be aware of? High Volatility: While Bitcoin has surged, it can also experience rapid corrections. Prices can fluctuate wildly, leading to significant unrealized losses if not managed carefully. Regulatory Uncertainty: The regulatory landscape for cryptocurrencies is still evolving globally. Sudden policy changes or crackdowns in major economies could impact market sentiment and prices. Market Manipulation: The crypto market is not immune to large players or ‚Äúwhales‚Äù whose significant holdings and trading activities can influence prices. Security Risks: Storing and managing cryptocurrencies requires robust security practices to protect against hacks, scams, and loss of private keys. Actionable Insights for Investors: To navigate the current market climate effectively, consider these actionable steps: Do Your Own Research (DYOR): Never invest based solely on hype. Understand the fundamentals, technology, and market dynamics. Start Small and Gradually Accumulate (DCA): Instead of investing a large sum at once, consider dollar-cost averaging (DCA), investing fixed amounts regularly to average out your entry price. Risk Management: Only invest what you can afford to lose. Set stop-loss orders to limit potential downsides and take profits strategically. Secure Your Assets: Use reputable exchanges and consider hardware wallets for long-term storage of significant holdings. Looking Ahead: What Does This Bitcoin Price Surge Mean for the Future? The breaking of the $119,000 barrier by Bitcoin is not just a moment of celebration; it‚Äôs a significant indicator of potential future trends. This latest Bitcoin price surge could be a stepping stone towards even higher valuations, reflecting a growing acceptance of digital assets in the global financial system. Many analysts are now revising their price targets upwards, with some predicting Bitcoin could eventually challenge and surpass previous all-time highs. The increasing integration of Bitcoin into traditional finance, coupled with its finite supply, continues to build a compelling long-term investment case. Consider the potential ripple effects: Increased Institutional Inflows: Success stories like this surge can encourage more institutional players to allocate capital to Bitcoin, creating a virtuous cycle of demand. Broader Ecosystem Growth: A strong Bitcoin often lifts the entire crypto market, benefiting altcoins and decentralized finance (DeFi) projects. Innovation Acceleration: Higher valuations can fund more research and development into blockchain technology, leading to more practical applications and improved infrastructure. Regulatory Clarity: As Bitcoin gains more prominence, governments and regulatory bodies may be compelled to provide clearer frameworks, which could further legitimize the asset class. While the path ahead may still have its bumps, the current momentum suggests a future where Bitcoin plays an even more central role in global finance. This latest milestone serves as a powerful reminder of the asset‚Äôs enduring appeal and its potential to reshape how we perceive and interact with money. Conclusion: Riding the Wave of Bitcoin‚Äôs Ascent The news of Bitcoin rising above $119,000 is a thrilling development for anyone watching the cryptocurrency markets. This significant Bitcoin price surge , confirmed by Bitcoin World market monitoring and observed on platforms like Binance, underscores the asset‚Äôs robust demand and the growing confidence among investors. It‚Äôs a clear signal that Bitcoin continues to mature as a legitimate and powerful financial asset. While the journey of any investment involves risks, understanding the underlying drivers‚Äîfrom institutional adoption to macroeconomic shifts‚Äîand applying sound investment strategies can help navigate the exciting yet volatile world of digital currencies. As Bitcoin continues its impressive climb, it reaffirms its position at the forefront of a financial revolution, inviting both seasoned investors and curious newcomers to explore its transformative potential. The future of finance is unfolding before our eyes, and Bitcoin is undeniably leading the charge. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What does it mean for Bitcoin to rise above $119,000? A1: It signifies a significant bullish trend and strong buying interest in the market. Breaking such a psychological and technical resistance level often indicates renewed investor confidence and potential for further upward movement. Q2: What factors are contributing to this Bitcoin price surge? A2: Several factors are at play, including increasing institutional adoption, concerns over macroeconomic inflation, the impact of the recent Bitcoin halving event, ongoing technological advancements, and renewed interest from retail investors. Q3: Is now a good time to invest in Bitcoin given its current price? A3: Investing in Bitcoin always carries risks due to its volatility. While the current surge indicates positive momentum, it‚Äôs crucial to conduct your own research (DYOR), consider your risk tolerance, and potentially use strategies like dollar-cost averaging (DCA) rather than investing a lump sum at a peak. Q4: How does this surge impact the broader cryptocurrency market? A4: Historically, a strong Bitcoin performance often has a positive ripple effect on the broader cryptocurrency market, leading to increased interest and potential price appreciation for altcoins as well. Bitcoin‚Äôs dominance can influence overall market sentiment. Q5: What are the main risks associated with investing during a Bitcoin price surge? A5: The primary risks include high volatility leading to rapid price corrections, regulatory uncertainties that could impact market sentiment, potential market manipulation by large holders, and security risks associated with storing digital assets. Share This Article! Found this analysis of the Bitcoin price surge insightful? Share it with your friends, family, and fellow crypto enthusiasts on social media! Let‚Äôs spread awareness about the exciting developments in the world of digital finance. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action . This post Bitcoin Price Surge Unleashed: BTC Breaches $119,000 Mark! first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

headline: XRP‚Äôs network activity nosedives 45% in a week; Crash below $3 next?
summary: XRP‚Äôs network activity has taken a major hit, with active addresses plunging alongside the asset‚Äôs inability to push further toward the $4 mark. Notably, the number of XRP‚Äôs active addresses peaked at 44,143 on July 21 on the weekly timeframe before dropping to just 24,644 by July 27, a 44.2% decline. The drop followed a brief surge from 30,190 on July 20, indicating that the increase in user activity was short-lived, according to the latest on-chain data retrieved by Finbold from CryptoQuant. At the same time, XRP‚Äôs price fell from $3.55 to $3.16, marking a 10.99% drop. XRP active addresses chart. Source: CryptoQuant The sharp decline in active addresses signals weakening demand and network usage, eroding XRP‚Äôs price support. With the asset breaking below $3.50, sentiment has cooled, and capital is shifting back to Bitcoin, stalling the broader altcoin rally. XRP whale activity spooks investors XRP‚Äôs recent loss of momentum has also been triggered by sustained whale activity. Investors were spooked after Ripple co-founder Chris Larsen moved around $140 million worth of XRP to exchange-linked wallets since July 17. A total of 50 million XRP, worth approximately $161 million, was transferred, with most of it going to centralized exchanges. Meanwhile, 10 million XRP was split between two newly inactive wallets, raising speculation about strategic profit-taking. While some view the move as routine, others warn it could have a significant market impact. Adding to concerns, CryptoQuant contributor J.A. Maartunn cautioned that Larsen still holds over 2.5 billion XRP, worth nearly $9 billion, suggesting that further selling could exert additional downward pressure on the token. üö® Chris Larsen (Ripple co-founder) still holds 2.58B $XRP ‚Äî that‚Äôs $8.83B. If $200M was just the warm-up‚Ä¶ what‚Äôs next? Don‚Äôt get dumped on. Don‚Äôt be the exit liquidity. Protect yourself. üëá https://t.co/k152FXlm8N pic.twitter.com/T5CpTQjdDa ‚Äî Maartunn (@JA_Maartun) July 25, 2025 As things stand, XRP will likely need support from the broader market to maintain its price above the $3 mark, especially as the asset continues to mirror Bitcoin‚Äôs trend. However, further upside could emerge if the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) moves forward with approving a spot XRP ETF and brings the long-running case against Ripple to a conclusion. Featured image via Shutterstock The post XRP‚Äôs network activity nosedives 45% in a week; Crash below $3 next? appeared first on Finbold .
